name: K8News
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get the latest information from Region 8 News Jonesboro, Arkansas within Alexa's Flash Briefing.

Enable this Skill, then say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear the audio.

Feeds include the latest weather forecast for the Jonesboro, Arkansas area from the Region 8 News Weather team.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
